title: BitcoinMoses
author: BitcoinMoses
content: Bitcoin Bear Market is ending soon you have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buy. Next year 2023 is year of Bitcoin Bull Run. There will be much fun because Satoshi will return, and it will be a chaos first, but Michael will Sing a new Liberty Song, that make bitcoin so strong, it will jump toward the moon very soon. If you believe or nor, I don't care but I am giving a chance to get a share of my 1.1 million Bitcoin. Those will join, You will it from me as a donation to do some decoration in the New Bitcoin Foundation. Just wake up, leave your coffee cup and search to buy other wise you will cry.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMBitcoin Bear Market is ending soon you have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buy.There's no end to bitcoin market to buy or to sell, some already had it 12 years ago while some 5year ago and now is never too late to set in as well, there will always be a rise and fall to prove it being volatile, but ensure whenever you wanted to buy, it should be within the previous Halving range, that is the lowest range as at present time from the ATH.Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMNext year 2023 is year of Bitcoin Bull RunThough i so much believe in this but what do you have as justification for this, it may begins this yearQuote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMThere will be much fun because Satoshi will returnReturn to where? Have you both had a conversation?  Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMand it will be a chaos first, but Michael will Sing a new Liberty Song, that make bitcoin so strong, it will jump toward the moon very soon. If you believe or nor, I don't care but I am giving a chance to get a share of my 1.1 million Bitcoin. Those will join, You will it from me as a donation to do some decoration in the New Bitcoin Foundation. Just wake up, leave your coffee cup and search to buy other wise you will cry. I won't get surprised if all these were just a simple explanation to why you need to buy bitcoin now! It looks funny, very much funny but just invest on bitcoin and forget the stories.

comments.author: ethereumhunter
comments.body: I'm not sure if the bear market will end soon but it could happen if there is a lot of positive bitcoin news, so many people will see that the market trend will change soon. But before that happens, we need to be able to collect more bitcoins before the rally starts because if it did, we would miss buying at low prices and not be able to celebrate the huge profits we could take. But I'm also not sure if Satoshi will come back next year because he's been hiding for years and we don't know who he is either.

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.body: The bitcoin market is unpredictable so for you to say the bear market is ending soon is an exaggerated statement since we are in a volatile market space nobody can predict the future of Bitcoin price, the price could move in whatever direction it all depends on the kind of news that break as regards to Bitcoin either positive or negative they're all have their impact on the price. Claiming to be Satoshi is another statement that is false because Satoshi has an account on the forum so if you post to claim his identity then that is a criminal act.

comments.author: TheNineClub
comments.body: Trying to predict economic fluctuations is a coin toss, and being sure about is completly false. We can speculate that the cycles will continue as they did in previous, and I am not saying it won't, but there are to many factors involved, especialy with those factors being so strong (war, recession). So all of this what you are saying is at best an educated guess, at worst just a random guess.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMBitcoin Bear Market is ending soon you have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buy. Next year 2023 is year of Bitcoin Bull Run. At first before we come to conclusion concerning some certain cryptocurrency speculations, we have to make a proper findings concerning the market regulations or market movement of cryptocurrency to be precised. Because their is something i understand via prediction of the increment of cryptocurrency and decrement of cryptocurrency, from my perspective. Bullrun is been determined by the determinant of the demands that enters the market. But right now the market is still moving slowing, which their is every tendency that it can fall back

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: Hi there guys, i don't think you guys should take op too seriously, neither should you try to reply seriously, suggesting this or that to them about bitcoin, let me help you guys, Op sounds like a troll who is claiming to be Satoshi anyway, maybe a lesser troll than CSW so he prefers this forum to the court room. Op had this to say sometime ago:Quote from: BitcoinMoses on May 12, 2022, 06:49:29 PMYou are saying Satoshi Nakamoto is one of the great mind. But you need to know, that Satoshi Nakamoto is my Pseudonym. Theymos is also my pseudonym. When I am Satoshi Nakamoto, how can I am trying to steal my own pseudonym ?  You need to understand something that you are making a bad comment. You suppose to ask me sign a message from the Genesis BTC address; instead you are insulting me. I am the the same man who created this very Forum where you are insaulting me. It is your ignorance. I won't get angry to you because, unconsciously you are a devoted follower of my Japanese Pseudonym but you hate my Jewish Pseudonym. You are anti Semitic. I think you love eating too much Sushi with my stolen Bitcoin. Please make your comment civil and that is good for you and me and every one. Satoshi Nakamoto  !)ruidWhat more can you suggest to them who created the network.

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMBitcoin Bear Market is ending soon you have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buy. Can you show me your crystal ball?  It might we're the same.But hey, just let you know the market movement is unpredictable same as Bitcoin price movement. If you don't sure about the movement of the market price you can buy Bitcoin in a DCA way, this is a safe idea if you're afraid to be trapped in the bear market.  IMO, it seems there's no sign yet of the bull market and it could be next year still Bitcoin struggling to resist the price. Speaking of the best time to buy Bitcoin, IMO, anytime you can buy as long as you never sell under the price where you purchase.

comments.author: BALIK
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMBitcoin Bear Market is ending soon you have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buy. Next year 2023 is year of Bitcoin Bull Run. There will be much fun because Satoshi will return, and it will be a chaos first, but Michael will Sing a new Liberty Song, that make bitcoin so strong, it will jump toward the moon very soon. If you believe or nor, I don't care but I am giving a chance to get a share of my 1.1 million Bitcoin. Those will join, You will it from me as a donation to do some decoration in the New Bitcoin Foundation. Just wake up, leave your coffee cup and search to buy other wise you will cry. As the market is unpredictable, it is not a good idea to make an assertion without having any evidence to support it. If you believe that 2023 will be the bull run then you better focus on accumulating bitcoin now, otherwise you will not benefit if the market really goes up in 2023.Why did you mention that Satoshi will be back next year, he has decided to remain anonymous and not to come back to us so don't drag him into the market anymore, bitcoin goes up or down depending on supply and demand, world economic factors. He is not the one to decide the price of bitcoin.

comments.author: amishmanish
comments.body: Just a thought, can Bitcoin market work as an alternative to finance markets, whereby we can buy and sell stocks of any company around the globe using Bitcoin wallet. That will be great to see. Anyways, yes if you wish to make really good profits, it is now time to buy Bitcoin. Because soon there will be a bull run in market, and your timely investments can give you handsome returns.

comments.author: DigitalMonk
comments.body: I think Lord Bitcoin Moses is Goldman Sach. Or may be he  is Bitcoin Rothschild. He claim that he is Satoshi Nakamoto, who knows, may be he is Satoshi. If he is not then how dare he publish the Genesis Block address is belong to him ? If he is the real Satoshi Nakamoto whom the Coinbase is scared of, means he need to prove his word by signing a message. Or he might be Dr Wright, acting as BitcoinMoses. Nice to meet you Lord Bitcoin Moses. Now can you confirm your claim ?  If you are real Satoshi then Please stand up and come forward and sign the message. Dr Wright said in a YouTube that there is people beside him who can prove that he is not Faketoshi but Satoshi. Now the real point is Extra Ordinary Claim requires an extraordinary evidence. Why Satoshi real Satodhi need other people's help to prove his identity ? If he is genuine inventor of Bitcoin and the Blockchain then he can sign a message with the Genesis Block Address. Any way, whoever is Satoshi the real one but not Faketoshi must be able to send some coin to my Charity Address. Any way, this is a word of evidence for the real Satoshi. I AM not begging for Bitcoin. I am The Digital Monk does not mean I here to beg for Bitcoin. May the heaven bless you Lord Moses.

comments.author: laurenB7742
comments.body: All of the statements you made, I don't think any of them will be able to come true. The majority of you make emotional predictions without conducting any prior research or analysis. Except for this, I will agree with you: Quoteyou have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buyThere is still time to buy bitcoin, particularly since we are in a bear market, and the price of bitcoin is being heavily discounted from its ATH. If you don't want to miss out on profits in the upcoming bull season then you should try to collect as many bitcoins as possible during this time. Once the bull market arrives, this opportunity will never come again.

comments.author: Ahli38
comments.body: In 2023, there may indeed be a potential for a bullish market to emerge. but it's just speculation. and of course that is what many people expect. However, we still don't know where the bear market will end. but as long as this bearish market occurs. it will eventually stop and be replaced with a bull market.so keep feeling neutral in analyzing the current market situation. so that we become calmer in determining the position of entry and exit. analysis must be with mature data and calculations. and neutral or calm thoughts. because the analysis involving excessive emotions will only disrupt the analysis that has been arranged neatly into a mess.phased buying with DCA is still very effective today.keep calm and enjoy this moment

comments.author: worle1bm
comments.body: Another one of the fantasy stories we have heard ober the forum by scammers pretending to be Satoshi but need to tell you that this will give you nothing but negative trust on the forum for spreading these fake rumours and soon you will be out of this space.How come you know bear market is over when it's unpredictable and demand -supply moves the price of bitcoin so you are wrong on that part also.How come a Liberty song could take these prices to the moon? If it's the case then one song and we don't need any economic rules and investment in it maybe.I don't understand what you get from all of this mess cook up of fake claims when you can't prove anything to others like all the faketoshis out there.

comments.author: gullobhai
comments.body: There's no end to bitcoin market to buy or to sell, there will always be a hype and down to prove it being volatile,also people's buying & selling bcz it's trading market...

comments.author: yhiaali3
comments.body: I strongly believe in the rise of Bitcoin, but I do not specify the next year in particular, it may be the year after next in 2024, according to my predictions, the rise will start at the end of next year, but these are all just guesses, no one can know exactly what will happen, the most important advice at the moment is to buy and hold Until the big rally and new high happens, I'm sure we'll see a new ATH in the next couple of years.

comments.author: piebeyb
comments.body: if only people understood my message in this thread, maybe they will believe that it doesn't have to take 4 years in 2025 for bitcoin to hit another ATH, if this year the bear market has gone I believe next will be a bull market again, I hope people people don't forget the opportunity of this moment to buy it cheap now

comments.author: Hyphen(-)
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on August 23, 2022, 01:38:43 AMBitcoin Bear Market is ending soon you have still time to buy as many bitcoin you can afford to buy. Yes, now is a good time for people to invest in Bitcoin because the price is low due to the bearish market situation. Investing now means someone still believes in Bitcoin and will profit once the market returns to normal.QuoteNext year 2023 is year of Bitcoin Bull Run. Is there a time constraint for the market's bull run?The crypto market condition is unpredictable; we have heard so many predictions from Bitcoin technical analysts about the pump this year, but the year is coming to an end and there have been no changes in the market condition; it is extremely difficult to predict the market direction.

comments.author: Finestream
comments.body: Quote from: ethereumhunter on August 23, 2022, 05:32:06 PMI'm not sure if the bear market will end soon but it could happen if there is a lot of positive bitcoin news, so many people will see that the market trend will change soon. But before that happens, we need to be able to collect more bitcoins before the rally starts because if it did, we would miss buying at low prices and not be able to celebrate the huge profits we could take. But I'm also not sure if Satoshi will come back next year because he's been hiding for years and we don't know who he is either. No one can exactly predict as to when bear market is going to end and bull market will start to enter. But as long as positive news and trends will keep coming in the market, it’s always expected that the market will be influenced too and turn into bullish. And for us not to be left behind when the bull market is finally here, let’s keep on buying bitcoin and hold them for long term. That way, we will reap huge profits if we only sell when there is bullish season.

comments.author: ninis45
comments.body: everyone is free to speculate because this is a positive value but in reality the bull market is sometimes wilder than a raging bear, and now buying is a wise thing if you have more funds and next month the price will be the start of a new trend for bitcoin to make a small mound
